name: Front-End Development
description: Learn to build modern web applications with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Master responsive design and user interface development.

name: Full-Stack Development
description: Master both client-side and server-side development with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and React. Learn to build complete web applications.

name: Data Analysis Fundamentals
description: Learn Python fundamentals, data manipulation with pandas, and statistical analysis. Build your foundation as a data analyst.

name: Data Visualization & Machine Learning
description: Create compelling visualizations and learn machine learning basics. Master data storytelling and predictive analytics.

name: Data Engineering
description: Build data pipelines, work with databases, and create data engineering solutions. Advanced data science specialization.

name: Career Development
description: Prepare for your job search with CV writing, interview skills, networking, and understanding the German job market.
